Name: The Burnt School
About the game: The History Adventure game and a little horror based on the history of the burnt school present in the game, where you play with a boy who he was recruited by a lost soul to save schoolmates imprisoned from the curse that surrounds the school where he studies. This boy's name is Marcos, and he will need to face several challenges to free each of the souls trapped in the school. Core Mechanic The Burnt School uses basic third-person motion mechanics in the style of classic games of this genre. With this basic mechanics, you run and run away from enemies, and in the bosses stages you can unleash magic to attack your enemies. Immersion and Graphics With nice 3D low poly graphics and soundtracks that resemble the setting of the stage, of the cutscenes. This game will give you, as an adult, the feeling of going back to the past at school. There will be many challenges, and little by little you will discover why the school was on fire. In addition to epic battles against the cause of all evil. Game features - In total there are 5 missions to be completed, where you go to the past and then back to the present. In the final mission you can have 3 different endings depending on your choice. - Save system for each level, you can return to the level where you left off, so you don't have to play the game again. - The game has languages, English and Portuguese. - Game volume settings menu as well as additional screen effects to the game environment. - Contains cutscenes and screens with images that help explain the story of the game, as well as alternative endings. Backstage Game made by a single developer.
